short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify that you want to raise a hand in google meet meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will pop up a confirmation when you click the "Raise Hand" button in a Google Meet meeting, so that you do not inadvertently raise a hand when you are trying click any other buttons in the bottom menu.

We have all been there. You are in a Google Meet meeting and you want to react with applause or a thumbs up, but you raise your hand instead. Cue the awkward moment where the call pauses to look at you, embarrassed and ready to never react again. This is extension is here to save you from making this mistake ever again.
